name: Beryllium iodide
desc: Beryllium iodide is the chemical compound with the formula BeI2. It is very hygroscopic and reacts violently with water, forming hydroiodic acid.
Solubility:
Slightly soluble in CS2
Soluble in ethanol, diethyl ether[2]
PEL (Permissible):
TWA 0.002 mg/m3
C 0.005 mg/m3 (30 minutes), with a maximum peak of 0.025 mg/m3 (as Be)[3]
Other anions:
Beryllium fluoride
Beryllium chloride
Beryllium bromide
Other cations:
magnesium iodide
calcium iodide
strontium iodide
barium iodide
